com.github.glusk2.sprouts.core.comb

Class SproutsEdge

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.glusk2.sprouts.core.comb.SproutsEdge
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Comparable<SproutsEdge>

    public final class SproutsEdge
extends Object
implements Comparable<SproutsEdge>
    A directed edge from vertex from() to to().

    Every directed edge must have at least 2 points.

    Edge direction can be either positive or negative. Refer to isPositive() for more info.

    Directed edges with the same origin (from()) can be compared.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SproutsEdge

        public SproutsEdge(Polyline polyline,
                   Color fromColor,
                   Color toColor)
        Creates a red edge has a positive direction.

        This constructor is useful for creating cobweb edges.

        Parameters:
        polyline - the polyline that represents this edge
        fromColor - the color of the origin vertex (this.from())
        toColor - the color of the destination vertex (this.to())

      • SproutsEdge

        public SproutsEdge(boolean direction,
                   Polyline polyline,
                   Color fromColor,
                   Color toColor)
        Creates a black edge.

        This constructor is useful for creating player sub-move edges.

        Parameters:
        direction - the direction of this edge (true - positive, false - negative)
        polyline - the polyline that represents this edge
        fromColor - the color of the origin vertex (this.from())
        toColor - the color of the destination vertex (this.to())

      • SproutsEdge

        public SproutsEdge(boolean direction,
                   Polyline polyline,
                   Color fromColor,
                   Color toColor,
                   Color edgeColor)
        Creates a new edge from a full list of attributes.

        This is the generic primary constructor that's not meant to be used directly.

        Parameters:
        direction - the direction of this edge (true - positive, false - negative)
        polyline - the polyline that represents this edge
        fromColor - the color of the origin vertex (this.from())
        toColor - the color of the destination vertex (this.to())
        edgeColor - the color of this edge

      • isPositive

        public boolean isPositive()
        Return the direction of this polyline.

        A positive direction means that this is a directed edge of the form: 

         p[0], p[1], ..., p[polylineSize-1]
        and a negative direction means that this is a directed edge of the form: 
         p[polylineSize-1], p[polylineSize-2], ..., p[0]
        where p[i] are the points in this.polyline().points().
        Returns:
        true - positive, false - negative
